venue.address_2: Actual address is 550 but wrong on Google
venue.name: Seacoast Family YMCA

item.description:
Cheri Perry will be offering this one hour workshop linking yoga poses to paddling and rolling a kayak. Join us and learn how to lengthen your spine, strengthen your core, stretch out your hamstrings, get better balance, find more rotation, and more. All poses will be accompanied by a discussion about how these will benefit your paddling and rolling skills. Since this session is being held directly before the pool there will be a focus on kayak rolling, and specific land drills to help you improve your roll! This session is open to folks new to yoga as well as experienced yogi's and yogini's. Join us!

You can mail payment to

Kayak Ways LLC

PO Box 122

Brownfield, ME 04010

or bring it with you.
item.how_to_find_us: Come on in! The folks at the desk will direct you to the room!
item.name: Yoga for Rolling
